game.name: Pro Wrestling Action
game.description:
The biggest wrestling championship has just begun and you have already got participated in it! Hey! You have practiced for so many years on how to fight and throw your opponent out of the ring. Fight hard and use punch, kick and jump on your opponent to be the last man standing in Pro Wrestling Action! Your opponents are powerful and active so try to be active all the time until you are in the ring to knock them out.

It is time to perform a spectacular feat and use all the possible moves including diving on your opponent, timing your jumps and climbing the ropes to win! Either you or your opponent can stay in the ring! Try to throw all of them out of the ring and grab as many coins as you can to upgrade your wrester in the shop in this HTML5 wrester game! Choose any fighter out of many options including The Cliff, Bold Steve, John Rhino, Vladmir Strongman, Bulk, Crock The Beast, Crock The Beast, Curve Angle, and Mexicano!

You cannot get relaxed until you throw your opponents when they fall to the ground. There are multiple attacks to choose from. Raise your money to prepare your favorite wrester in your store! We are damn sure that all fans of UFC, WWF, WCW, and WWE will love this game pretty much. Check out other popular tiles from the huge category of free action games that are playable on multiple devices without download!
game.metaTitle: Pro Wrestling Action Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Pro Wrestling Action at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: L -JOYSTSICK TO MOVE, RIGHT ICON TO FIGHT
game.webControlKeys: MOUSE TO MOVE ARROUND, L CLICK TO FIGHT
